message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product that I believe will revolutionize your business. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $1500000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to offer you a compromise at $1200000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1200000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $950000. However, I still think the product's value is worth more than that. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000. This is as low as I can go, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle from here.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target, but I'm still not comfortable with $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll go up to $975000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to what I'm looking for. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price.

I understand that you've made several concessions, but I'm still not willing to go above $975000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm willing to meet you at $975000, and that's my final offer.

I understand that we're at an impasse, but I'm not willing to give up on the sale just yet. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get at least $1000000 for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1025000. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm hoping you'll reconsider.

I'm not willing to go above $975000. I'm willing to walk away from the deal if we can't agree on a price. I'm not interested in buying the product from you for more than $975000. Please let's end the negotiation here.
